name: Car and Candies
description:
Instructions to Play

1) You have a Car , You can drive it using Keys 

Acceleration : Upper Arrow key or "W"

Left deviation : Left Arrow key or "A"

Right deviation : Right Arrow key or "D"

Reverse : Down Arrow key or "S"

2) You need to Collect Candies to complete the level. Each level has 5-10 candies, You must Collect ALL CANDIES.

3) BLUE Obstacles are dangerous dont touch it, If touched the level will be restart.

4) Ground is Green colored, dont fall outside of the ground, also careful with your car's wheels.   If Fallen the level will be restart.

5) You need to move , Don't wait more than 5 sec without movement, it leads to restart level.
